programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le Super-secoueur / La ferme en folie) S8 (16/24)
programme.desc: «Le Super-secoueur / La ferme en folie»Farmer Al's harvest machine goes haywire and shakes up Adventure Bay, even threatening to rock the Lookout off its foundation. // Farmer Al has a wild dream that the Paw Patrol must rescue he and Yumi when his animals start acting like humans.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Les mini héros / Un visage dans l'espace) S2 (n°214)
programme.desc: «Les mini héros / Un visage dans l'espace»When the younger animals in the forest want to be like their heroes Deer Squad, things don't go as planned as Sir Steel steps in. // The Deer Squad have to save the day in Space when Sir Steel's plan to project his face on the moon goes wrong!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Deer Ball) S2 (n°12)
programme.desc: «Deer Ball»Things get competitive when Sir Steel takes on the Deer Squad for the Deer Ball Cup - but who's bending the rules?

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Visits the Doctor / Paddington and the Sleep Over) S2 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Paddington Visits the Doctor / Paddington and the Sleep Over»Paddington hurts his knee & goes to see Dr Yasmin. When she steps out, he steps UP and is mistaken for a doctor. // Can Mr. Brown's sleepover live up to Mrs. Brown's high standard when Simi and Toq come to stay for the night?

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Water Walker / Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Windsurfer) S8 (6/24)
programme.desc: «Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Water Walker / Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Windsurfer»Mayor Humdinger swipes Francois' water-walking shoes and ends up trapped in a pit-like turtle nest. // A long lost letter inspires Ms. Marjorie to visit an old surfing buddy. The pups spring into action when a nearby volcano erupts.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La Pat'Patrouille des Mers et Sid Laratisse) S5 (9/26)
programme.desc: «La Pat'Patrouille des Mers et Sid Laratisse»The ferris wheel has been stolen by Sid the Pirate and Arrby. The pups set out to bring it back to Adventure Bay! However, Sid comes up with an even more sneaky plan: to steal the Sea Patroller!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La Pat' Patrouille des mers sauve Pat'lantis) S4 (26/26)
programme.desc: «La Pat' Patrouille des mers sauve Pat'lantis»Sid Swashbuckle the Pirate and his first pup mate Arrby steal the giant pearl-making shell that gives Puplantis its magic.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La Pat' Patrouille des mers sauve l'épave d'un bateau / La Pat' Patrouille des mers sauve une baleine) S5 (3/26)
programme.desc: «La Pat' Patrouille des mers sauve l'épave d'un bateau / La Pat' Patrouille des mers sauve une baleine»Sid the Pirate and his First Mate Arrby have taken the sunken sloop! A wiggling whale has knocked the diving bell upside down.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save the Pier) S4 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Pups Save the Pier»The pier could fall into the water due to a broken support post.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Aqua Pups Save a Floating Castle) S9 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Aqua Pups Save a Floating Castle»When an unhappy Merpup tries to float Puplantis to the surface, it's up to the Paw Patrol and their newest member Coral (Skye's long-lost merpup cousin) to save the city and stop him.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Bonnie's Mom) S2 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Bonnie's Mom»Santi and crew must team up with Bonnie to rescue her mom, pirate Billie Bones, from her sneaky first mate!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Busy Baby) S1 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Busy Baby»Baby Shark bites off more than he can chew before his big dance party with Grandma Shark.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Détective Baby Shark) S1 (n°9)
programme.desc: «Détective Baby Shark»When Grandma's shortcake goes missing before the bake-off, it's a case for Detective Baby Shark and William Watson!

programme.title: Mini Chef (Lemonade) S1 (n°3)
programme.desc: «Lemonade»Tiny Chef makes pink lemonade and has to convince Ruby that trying new things can be fun!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Il neige sur la jungle / Les cornichons explosifs) S5 (23/26)
programme.desc: «Il neige sur la jungle / Les cornichons explosifs»Mr. Porter and Alex go camping on a tropical island. When the weather suddenly turns, the Paw Patrol must come to their rescue. Mr. Porter has made his famous bridal dresses and delivers them all over Adventure Bay.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et la fête de madame Bird) S2 (4/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington et la fête de madame Bird»It's Mrs. Bird Day & Paddington wants to make a cake with a Special jar of Marmalade but no one can open it - how will he show his appreciation?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le Supermarché) S1 (49/52)
programme.desc: «Le Supermarché»Peppa and her family go to the grocery store for some tomatoes, spaghetti, onions and fruit, but Daddy Pig gets some chocolate cake for the kids.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Mon anniversaire) S1 (50/52)
programme.desc: «Mon anniversaire»It is Peppa's birthday, and Peppa has a party.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La caméra de papa) S1 (51/52)
programme.desc: «La caméra de papa»Daddy gets a new video camera. First, Peppa shows him how to work it, and then he records Peppa being silly.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Greedy Gobbler) S1 (n°67)
programme.desc: «The Greedy Gobbler»While Bubu and Christopher want to enjoy an hazelnut snack, their hazelnuts go missing! When Anna, Froga and Ron's chocolate snack also disappears, the friends are convinced it's the work of the GREEDY GOBBLER and the HAZELNUT PRANKSTERS.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (A Longchair for Ron) S1 (n°68)
programme.desc: «A Longchair for Ron»A sleeping spider squats Ron's swing, and he can't take a nap. He laments to Anna and Froga that he wishes he had a deck chair to sleep on. This gives them the idea to surprise him with one.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Into the Blueniverse) S3 (n°17)
programme.desc: «Into the Blueniverse»It's an interstellar Blue's Clues adventure! Magenta's toy spaceship spins out of control, disappearing into Blueniverse. Where in the Blueniverse is Magenta's spaceship? We'll play Blue's Clues to find out!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save a Show Jumper / Pups Save the Salmon) S8 (13/24)
programme.desc: «Pups Save a Show Jumper / Pups Save the Salmon»Winnie Winnington goes looking for a frog to enter in a frog-jumping contest and ends up needing rescued in a swamp. // The pups must help salmon get to the ocean and also need to rescue Alex who gets stuck on top of a dam.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Solve the Mystery of the Missing Art) S9 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Pups Solve the Mystery of the Missing Art»When all the paintings mysteriously disappear from the Art Museum festival, the PAW Patrol must solve the Missing Art Mystery and return all the paintings.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Les Nuages de couleur / La grande course) S1 (n°12)
programme.desc: «Les Nuages de couleur / La grande course»Sir Steel is upset with Lola's sky art as it affects the popularity of his hat stand, so he tries to disperse her artwork. // The Deer Squad have a race to see whose cart is the fastest, but Sir Steel unexpectedly join in with his Steelmobile!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Perruque en fuite / Ça tourne !) S2 (n°3)
programme.desc: «Perruque en fuite / Ça tourne !»When Sir Steel's high-tech wig malfunctions and goes on the rampage in Platinum City the Deer Squad race to the rescue. // The Deer Squad must think fast to save Lady Fluffpot when Sir Steel's filming turns into a Disaster Movie!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's Treasure Hunt / Paddington's Taste of Italy) S2 (n°20)
programme.desc: «Paddington's Treasure Hunt / Paddington's Taste of Italy»Jonathan & Paddington find a treasure map in a bottle on the lake! Judy & Toq also find a treasure map, but who will find the treasure first? // Mr. Gruber has always wanted to go to Italy & Paddington sets about helping his friend achieve his dream!

programme.title: Mini Chef (Lemonade) S1 (n°3)
programme.desc: «Lemonade»Tiny Chef makes pink lemonade and has to convince Ruby that trying new things can be fun!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La Pat' Patrouille des mers sauve la Limande / La Pat' Patrouille des mers sauve un narval) S4 (22/26)
programme.desc: «La Pat' Patrouille des mers sauve la Limande / La Pat' Patrouille des mers sauve un narval»Cap'n Turbot's boat gets frozen in the Arctic Ice. // The pups use the Sea Patroller to help guide a lost narwhal back home.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La Pat'Patrouille des mers : Le volcan sous-marin / La Pat'Patrouille des mers : Inondation à la ferme) S5 (6/26)
programme.desc: «La Pat'Patrouille des mers : Le volcan sous-marin / La Pat'Patrouille des mers : Inondation à la ferme»Francois and Turbot discover an underwater volcano is going to erupt while Farmer Yumi and Mayor Goodway are unknowingly scuba diving nearby. This is a mission for the Sea Patrol! // Farmer Al's farm is flooded! The PAW Patrol needs to rescue him.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La Pat' Patrouille des mers sauve mamie Tilly / Un éléphant en colère) S5 (13/26)
programme.desc: «La Pat' Patrouille des mers sauve mamie Tilly / Un éléphant en colère»The Paw Patrol must rescue Cap'n Turbot and Francois' Grandma Tilly after she rides off on a Dolphin. // Carlos and Tracker calls the Paw Patrol to help solve the mystery of a rumbling sound that's upsetting the Jungle elephants.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Water Walker / Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Windsurfer) S8 (6/24)
programme.desc: «Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Water Walker / Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Windsurfer»Mayor Humdinger swipes Francois' water-walking shoes and ends up trapped in a pit-like turtle nest. // A long lost letter inspires Ms. Marjorie to visit an old surfing buddy. The pups spring into action when a nearby volcano erupts.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Sea Patrol 3 - Pups Save a Shark) S4 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Sea Patrol 3 - Pups Save a Shark»In hopes to have the whole beach to himself - Humdinger makes a robotic shark to scare everyone away.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Aqua Pups Save a Floating Castle) S9 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Aqua Pups Save a Floating Castle»When an unhappy Merpup tries to float Puplantis to the surface, it's up to the Paw Patrol and their newest member Coral (Skye's long-lost merpup cousin) to save the city and stop him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La pièce de théâtre) S1 (52/52)
programme.desc: «La pièce de théâtre»Peppa and her friends take part in a school play about Little Red Riding Hood, but Pedro Pony is nervous to be on the stage.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les vacances de Polly) S2 (3/52)
programme.desc: «Les vacances de Polly»Granny and Grandpa's pet, Polly Parrot comes to stay. Peppa and George love Polly Parrot. She is very funny and repeats everything anyone says. When Polly flies away, no one knows how to get her back, until George comes up with a very clever plan.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le vent d'automne) S2 (8/52)
programme.desc: «Le vent d'automne»It is a cold and windy day. At the park, all the leaves have turned red and yellow. It is so windy that Peppa's ball blows into the pond and George's hat blows into a tree.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Mystères) S2 (5/52)
programme.desc: «Mystères»Peppa, George, Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig are watching their favourite television programme: "Detective Potato". Peppa and George want to be famous detectives too. So, Daddy Pig gives them a mystery to solve. Teddy is hidden and Peppa and George try to find him. Using a magnifying glass, Peppa and George follow a trail of cake crumbs to solve the mystery.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le chantier naval de papy Rabbit) S3 (41/52)
programme.desc: «Le chantier naval de papy Rabbit»Grandpa Pig needs help when his boat sinks, so Granddad Dog gives them all a lift to Grampy Rabbit's Boatyard so that the boat can be fixed.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Secouer, racler, taper) S3 (42/52)
programme.desc: «Secouer, racler, taper»Madame Gazelle gives the class a music lesson. There's lots of crashing and banging at first, but it's not long before the grown-ups visit and lay down some notes of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Papa Pig, champion du monde) S4 (n°17)
programme.desc: «Papa Pig, champion du monde»Daddy Pig loses his title as Champion Puddle Jumper during the Daddi-Olympics, so everyone helps him train to win it back at the Daddi-Olympics.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (When I Grow Up) S1 (n°11)
programme.desc: «When I Grow Up»A bird builds its nest on Barbazoo's belly. Barbazoo wants to become a big tree to shelter animals. This becomes complicated.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barba TV / Le muséum) S1 (n°23)
programme.desc: «Barba TV / Le muséum»The barbababies are glued to the TV. Since they love it so much, their parents encourage them to make their own shows.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Dépanner c'est un métier) S3 (8/20)
programme.desc: «Dépanner c'est un métier»Blaze transforms into a tow-truck - and, with the help of AJ and Gabby, sets off on a tow-tally awesome adventure to save Stripes.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Gâteau-strophe !) S1 (11/20)
programme.desc: «Gâteau-strophe !»"When a hungry Crusher accidentally turns the baker truck's baker bots to messy mode, they sprout wheels and drive away! It's up to AJ and Blaze to track down all the rampaging robots before Axle City is blanketed in baked goods.".

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups vs. Ouchy Paws / Pups Save a Glow-in-the-Dark Party) S8 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Pups vs. Ouchy Paws / Pups Save a Glow-in-the-Dark Party»Sid Swashbuckle pretends to be a legendary ghost so that he can take Danny's new skateboard. // Ryder and the Pups race to save Mayor Goodway's Glow-in-the-Dark Party guests when a frightened Alien Boy zaps them into floating space bubbles.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le Super-secoueur / La ferme en folie) S8 (16/24)
programme.desc: «Le Super-secoueur / La ferme en folie»Farmer Al's harvest machine goes haywire and shakes up Adventure Bay, even threatening to rock the Lookout off its foundation. // Farmer Al has a wild dream that the Paw Patrol must rescue he and Yumi when his animals start acting like humans.

programme.desc: «Busy Baby»Baby Shark bites off more than he can chew before his big dance party with Grandma Shark.

programme.desc: «Détective Baby Shark»When Grandma's shortcake goes missing before the bake-off, it's a case for Detective Baby Shark and William Watson!

programme.title: Mini Chef (Lemonade) S1 (n°3)
programme.desc: «Lemonade»Tiny Chef makes pink lemonade and has to convince Ruby that trying new things can be fun!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Il neige sur la jungle / Les cornichons explosifs) S5 (23/26)
programme.desc: «Il neige sur la jungle / Les cornichons explosifs»Mr. Porter and Alex go camping on a tropical island. When the weather suddenly turns, the Paw Patrol must come to their rescue. Mr. Porter has made his famous bridal dresses and delivers them all over Adventure Bay.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et la fête de madame Bird) S2 (4/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington et la fête de madame Bird»It's Mrs. Bird Day & Paddington wants to make a cake with a Special jar of Marmalade but no one can open it - how will he show his appreciation?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le jour de sortie de Teddy) S2 (4/52)
programme.desc: «Le jour de sortie de Teddy»Peppa and her family are having a picnic lunch. Mr Zebra the Postman and Zoë Zebra are having a picnic too, so they decide to have one big picnic together. When it's time to go home, Peppa is having such a good time that, when it's home time, she leaves her teddy behind. But all ends well when Zoë Zebra and Mr Zebra the Postman make a very special delivery to Peppa's house...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Emilie Eléphant) S2 (2/52)
programme.desc: «Emilie Eléphant»There's a new pupil at the playgroup, Emily Elephant. Everybody wants to be her friend because she is very good at building blocks and can make a loud noise with her trunk.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'ami de George) S2 (6/52)
programme.desc: «L'ami de George»Rebecca Rabbit has a little bother called Richard who is the same age as George. George and Richard each have a toy dinosaur but George and Richard are not very good at sharing their toys. Mummy Pig shows George and Richard that they can have much more fun at the playground if they play together, just like their big sisters.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Bubu's New Blue Jeans) S1 (n°71)
programme.desc: «Bubu's New Blue Jeans»Christopher has prepared his annual obstacle race and is excited for all the friends to participate. Bubu's new blue jeans are still drying so he has to wear his brand-new pair to the event, he becomes overly concerned of getting them dirty.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Everywhere at Once) S1 (n°72)
programme.desc: «Everywhere at Once»Anna has prepared her ice cream for everyone but forgets to place it in the freezer. - as she is trying to help all her friends at once, the ice cream melts! Is it ruined or can it be saved?

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Let Justice Be Done / The Great Spring Clean) S1 (9/52)
programme.desc: «Let Justice Be Done / The Great Spring Clean»Barbabeau forgot to return his book to the library. As Mr Strict the librarian is visiting Barbapapa today, Barbabeau decides to run away. // Barbamama wants the barbababies to tidy their bedrooms. They're hiding to escape the drudgery.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue's Treasure of the Clue Lagoon) S3 (n°19)
programme.desc: «Blue's Treasure of the Clue Lagoon»Come on a beach adventure to Rainbow Cove with Blue, Josh and Rainbow Puppy! According to legend, there's a fantastic hidden treasure, and Rainbow Puppy wants Josh and Blue's help finding it.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Paw Patrol: Jet to the Rescue)
programme.desc: «Paw Patrol: Jet to the Rescue»The Duke of Flappington takes the Princess' gem and uses its magical powers to raise Barkingburg into the sky! Skye will need to overcome her biggest fears and lead the team in their biggest aerial rescue yet! Get ready to JET TO THE RESCUE!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Une pluie de peluches / Le bal masqué) S2 (n°204)
programme.desc: «Une pluie de peluches / Le bal masqué»Jade's first sleepover is an eventful occasion when Stu & Safia make it rain teddies across the city and Central Forest! // Sir Steel is put out when he discovers he's not been invited to Lady Fluffpot's party but the Deer Squad are.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Loves Windsor Gardens / Paddington Helps a Hedgehog) S2 (n°26)
programme.desc: «Paddington Loves Windsor Gardens / Paddington Helps a Hedgehog»It's Mrs. Bird Day & Paddington wants to make a cake with a Special jar of Marmalade but no one can open it - how will he show his appreciation?

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Hotel Paddington) S2 (24/27)
programme.desc: «Hotel Paddington»Paddington opens Windsor Gardens' first ever pet hotel when he has Lucky to stay over.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Pancakes) S1 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Pancakes»Tiny Chef makes pancakes but loses his confidence when he breaks his special lucky pancake flipping spatula.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Water Walker / Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Windsurfer) S8 (6/24)
programme.desc: «Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Water Walker / Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Windsurfer»Mayor Humdinger swipes Francois' water-walking shoes and ends up trapped in a pit-like turtle nest. // A long lost letter inspires Ms. Marjorie to visit an old surfing buddy. The pups spring into action when a nearby volcano erupts.

programme.desc: «La Pat'Patrouille des Mers et Sid Laratisse»The ferris wheel has been stolen by Sid the Pirate and Arrby. The pups set out to bring it back to Adventure Bay! However, Sid comes up with an even more sneaky plan: to steal the Sea Patroller!

programme.desc: «La Pat' Patrouille des mers sauve Pat'lantis»Sid Swashbuckle the Pirate and his first pup mate Arrby steal the giant pearl-making shell that gives Puplantis its magic.

programme.desc: «La Pat' Patrouille des mers sauve l'épave d'un bateau / La Pat' Patrouille des mers sauve une baleine»Sid the Pirate and his First Mate Arrby have taken the sunken sloop! A wiggling whale has knocked the diving bell upside down.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Sea Patrol 4 - Pups Save the Pier) S4 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Sea Patrol 4 - Pups Save the Pier»The pier could fall into the water due to a broken support post.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Aqua Pups Save a Floating Castle) S9 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Aqua Pups Save a Floating Castle»When an unhappy Merpup tries to float Puplantis to the surface, it's up to the Paw Patrol and their newest member Coral (Skye's long-lost merpup cousin) to save the city and stop him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le recyclage) S2 (11/52)
programme.desc: «Le recyclage»There is nothing more fun than sailing a boat .. isn't it? Peppa is a little dissatisfied with her boat at first, but then she discovers that sailing with paper boats is the most fun!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le bureau de papa Pig) S2 (22/52)
programme.desc: «Le bureau de papa Pig»Peppa and George are visiting Daddy Pig's office today. Daddy Pig works with Mr Rabbit and Mrs Cat. Mr. Rabbit's job is all about numbers, Mrs Cat's job is all about drawing shapes on the computer, and Daddy Pig's job is... complicated. Peppa and George have a go at each job. They love working at Daddy's office.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'île aux pirates) S2 (23/52)
programme.desc: «L'île aux pirates»Grandpa Pig takes Peppa and her friends on a boat trip to pirate island to dig for treasure. Ahhhh ... while they are building a sand castle Grandpa fell asleep on the boat and drifted away ... What now?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La vente de charité) S2 (19/52)
programme.desc: «La vente de charité»Peppa and George want to go to the playground with Papa and Mama Pig. But a fog sets in and they get lost. When Papa Pig thinks they are back home, the fog clears and they are... in the playground!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le moulin à paroles) S3 (44/52)
programme.desc: «Le moulin à paroles»Peppa Pig talks far too much. Or at least so Suzy thinks. In response, Peppa decides that she is never going to talk, ever again. But this does not last for very long at all.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le camion de Monsieur Fox) S3 (45/52)
programme.desc: «Le camion de Monsieur Fox»When Daddy Pig needs a new watch, Mr Fox finds three grandfather clocks in the back of his van. Three clocks are much better than one. Mr Fox has everything in his van - even a chicken!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les amis de Chloé) S3 (46/52)
programme.desc: «Les amis de Chloé»Peppa and George go to play with Cousin Chloe and her friends, but the older children don't want to play any "baby" games.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Grass is Always Greener...) S1 (n°11)
programme.desc: «The Grass is Always Greener...»Barbabright coats the house in magic product to prevent water leakage. The next day, The house deflates like a balloon.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barbidou ne sait pas dire non / Le sosie) S1 (n°24)
programme.desc: «Barbidou ne sait pas dire non / Le sosie»By chance, Barbazoo realizes he can imitate Barbapapa. He uses this opportunity to distribute chores to his brothers and sisters. Will they find out?

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Mission faucon) S3 (n°13)
programme.desc: «Mission faucon»Blaze visits the Animal Island with AJ and Gabby. The Super Air Race is held there. Blaze and his friends want to join in too but only Blaze can't fly.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Le Malfaiteur Mystérieux) S1 (12/20)
programme.desc: «Le Malfaiteur Mystérieux»After a win at the Dome, Blaze meets one of his biggest fans: Ferris. Moments later, the steel trophy won by Blaze and AJ suddenly disappeared. However, the mysterious bandit turns out to be Ferris.
